mapper.insert: insert into answer (userId, questionNo, answerContent, answerTime) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{answerContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
